text: Amazed by daryl and his team services. Friendly and professional who gives good recommendations and get things done in no time. Services and parts are of reasonable price. Do check out this workshop, highly recommended. Did i forget to mention even their car wash services is fantastic!!

Very humble and professional owner who has been in the trade for many years. Customers are mostly by word of mouth. Very honest. Overhauled our BMW and they only recommended some things that needs instead of pushing every service. Highly recommend.

Excellent service with detailed listing of all costs items. Great from car servicing and repairs. Especially Skilled in Continental Cars like Mercedes, BMW, Audi,..etc and great for Japanese cars too!

Went to a few workshop try to fix sound from my vehicle issue. Spent few thousand did not get to solve the issue.

Went to look for Daryl, spent few hundreds only my vehicle problem has been solved perfectly. ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»

Changed a number of parts saying this worn out and that worn out. Even the car bumper was not fixed properly. I had to fix it myself. Even changed the light saying it will not pass inspection. After two months- car completely broke down with the next repair shop saying best to scrap it. Previous job had been utter rubbish. Absolute rip off.
